section.title: Publishing a Virtual Machine to a Template (VMware Virtual Machines Only)

procedure.title: To Publish a Virtual Machine to a Template

step.para: Navigate to Infrastructure Virtual Machines, and check the virtual machine you want to publish as a template.

Click
(Lifecycle), and then
(Publish selected VM to a Template).
Fill in the options as shown in To Provision from a template using the provided dialogs. Be sure to check the Catalog tab.
Schedule the request on the Schedule tab.
